description:
Tests are over for second semester, and the school is out for break, with Christmas in the air, but Chloe doesn`t seem to be enjoying herself. The school starts worrying about her, but Chloe won`t spill the beans. Erena and Kokomi can`t take it anymore and set out to find the truth...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さよならア・ラ・モード
